description:
Embark on an action-packed adventure in Castaway, plunging players into a pixelated and retro universe. Take on the role of Martin, whose spaceship crash-landed on an uncharted island where his loyal pet was abducted by hostile creatures. Reclaim your weapons and set out to save your kidnapped companion in this charming and surprisingly dynamic world.
Defeat the 3 bosses in the concise and delightful "Story Mode" to unlock the thrilling and addictive "Survivor Mode." Scale a 50-floor tower, where each level presents progressively challenging trials!

KEY FEATURES:
• From the "pacifist" mode without enemies or "invincible" to the challenging "unfair" mode, Castaway appeals to all ages, catering to seasoned gamers and younger players discovering the genre for the first time.
• Test your skills in the speedrun mode and strive to complete the game as quickly as possible!
• Charming Pixel Art Graphics: Immerse yourself in a 2D retro pixel art world reminiscent of classic adventure games. It will evoke a sense of nostalgia!
• Unique Weapon Abilities: Solve puzzles by acquiring weapons with distinct characteristics - the sword for speed, the pickaxe for power, and the grappling hook for enhanced mobility.
• Enchanting Soundtrack: Enjoy chiptune melodies, whether heroic or haunting, paying homage to the 8-bit console era!
name: Castaway
